languages.text: "В системе обнаружен неизвестный объект. Артефакт отзывается на наши передачи неизвестным излучением — шестеренки говорят, ксеносской природы. Если хотите рассмотреть поближе, придется сократить расстояние между судном и объектом".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, в системе обнаружен неизвестный объект. Артефакт отзывается на наши передачи неизвестным излучением — вероятнее всего, ксеносской природы. Для дальнейшего обследования необходимо сократить расстояние между судном и объектом".

languages.text: "An unidentified object has been located in the system. The artefact reacts to our transmissions by releasing unknown radiation — most likely of xeno-origin, the cogs are reporting. If you want to get a closer look, we need to close the distance between the vessel and the object."
languages.original_text: "В системе обнаружен неизвестный объект. Артефакт отзывается на наши передачи неизвестным излучением — шестеренки говорят, ксеносской природы. Если хотите рассмотреть поближе, придется сократить расстояние между судном и объектом".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, an unidentified object has been located in the system. The artifacts reacts to our transmissions by releasing unknown radiation — most likely alien in origin. We need to close the distance between the object and the vessel to proceed with the investigation."

"Lord Captain, an unidentified object has been located in the system. The artifacts reacts to our transmissions by releasing unknown radiation — most likely alien in origin. We need to close the distance between the object and the vessel to proceed with the investigation."

"An unidentified object has been located in the system. The artefact reacts to our transmissions by releasing unknown radiation — most likely of xeno-origin, the cogs are reporting. If you want to get a closer look, we need to close the distance between the vessel and the object."

"An unidentified object has been located in the system. The artefact reacts to our transmissions by releasing unknown radiation — most likely of xeno-origin, the cogs are reporting. If you want to get a closer look, we need to close the distance between the vessel and the object."

"An unidentified object has been located in the system. The artefact reacts to our transmissions by releasing unknown radiation — most likely of xeno-origin, the cogs are reporting. If you want to get a closer look, we need to close the distance between the vessel and the object."

languages.text: “我们在这个星系中发现了一件不明物体，这件造物对我们的信号产生了反应，释放出了未知的辐射。它很有可能是异形的造物。如果您打算仔细观察，我们需要进一步接近造物。”
languages.original_text: "An unidentified object has been located in the system. The artefact reacts to our transmissions by releasing unknown radiation — most likely of xeno-origin, the cogs are reporting. If you want to get a closer look, we need to close the distance between the vessel and the object."

traits.locale_text: “我们在这个星系中发现了一件不明物体，这件造物对我们的信号产生了反应，释放出了未知的辐射。它很有可能是异形的造物。如果您打算仔细观察，我们需要进一步接近造物。”

languages.text: «Se ha localizado un objeto no identificado en el sistema. El artefacto reacciona a nuestras transmisiones emitiendo una radiación desconocida; probablemente de origen xenos, según las máquinas. Si quiere examinarlo en detalle, tendremos que aproximarnos a él».
languages.original_text: "An unidentified object has been located in the system. The artefact reacts to our transmissions by releasing unknown radiation — most likely of xeno-origin, the cogs are reporting. If you want to get a closer look, we need to close the distance between the vessel and the object."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha localizado un objeto no identificado en el sistema. El artefacto reacciona a nuestras transmisiones emitiendo una radiación desconocida; probablemente de origen xenos, según las máquinas. Si quiere examinarlo en detalle, tendremos que aproximarnos a él».

languages.text: "Ein nicht identifiziertes Objekt wurde im System geortet. Das Artefakt reagiert auf unsere Übertragung mit der Freisetzung einer unbekannten Strahlung ... vermutlich außerirdischer Herkunft, melden die Cogitatoren. Falls Ihr Euch ein genaueres Bild machen wollt, müssen wir die Distanz zwischen dem Schiff und dem Objekt verringern."
languages.original_text: "An unidentified object has been located in the system. The artefact reacts to our transmissions by releasing unknown radiation — most likely of xeno-origin, the cogs are reporting. If you want to get a closer look, we need to close the distance between the vessel and the object."

traits.locale_text: "Ein nicht identifiziertes Objekt wurde im System geortet. Das Artefakt reagiert auf unsere Übertragung mit der Freisetzung einer unbekannten Strahlung ... vermutlich außerirdischer Herkunft, melden die Cogitatoren. Falls Ihr Euch ein genaueres Bild machen wollt, müssen wir die Distanz zwischen dem Schiff und dem Objekt verringern."

languages.text: « Nous avons localisé un objet non identifié dans le système. L'artefact réagit à nos transmissions en émettant des radiations inconnues... et probablement d'origine xénos d'après les cogitateurs. Donnez l'ordre de nous en approcher si vous souhaitez l'étudier plus avant. »
languages.original_text: "An unidentified object has been located in the system. The artefact reacts to our transmissions by releasing unknown radiation — most likely of xeno-origin, the cogs are reporting. If you want to get a closer look, we need to close the distance between the vessel and the object."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons localisé un objet non identifié dans le système. L'artefact réagit à nos transmissions en émettant des radiations inconnues... et probablement d'origine xéno d'après les cogitateurs. Donnez l'ordre de nous en approcher si vous souhaitez l'étudier plus avant. »

languages.text: 「未確認の物体が星系内部で発見されました。アーティファクトは、こちらの信号に謎の放射エネルギーを放出して反応しています。おそらく異種族関係のものだと、歯車から報告がありました。もう少し近くで確認されたいなら、船と物体の距離を縮めなければなりません」
languages.original_text: "An unidentified object has been located in the system. The artefact reacts to our transmissions by releasing unknown radiation — most likely of xeno-origin, the cogs are reporting. If you want to get a closer look, we need to close the distance between the vessel and the object."

traits.locale_text: 「未確認の物体が星系内部で発見されました。アーティファクトは、こちらの信号に謎の放射エネルギーを放出して反応しています。おそらく異種族関係のものだと、歯車から報告がありました。もう少し近くで確認されたいなら、船と物体の距離を縮めなければなりません」

languages.text: "Sistemde tanımlanamayan bir nesne tespit edildi. Eser, bilinmeyen bir radyasyon salarak iletilerimize tepki veriyor. Teknikçiler, büyük ihtimalle zeno kökenli olduğunu söylüyor. Yakından bakmak isterseniz gemi ve nesne arasındaki mesafeyi kapamamız gerekecek."
languages.original_text: "An unidentified object has been located in the system. The artefact reacts to our transmissions by releasing unknown radiation — most likely of xeno-origin, the cogs are reporting. If you want to get a closer look, we need to close the distance between the vessel and the object."
